name: Rose BRUGNETTI v. Harry T. DARNALL and Helen T. Darnall, his wife, Appellants

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Rose BRUGNETTI v. Harry T. DARNALL and Helen T. Darnall, his wife, Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed.
Appellants to bear costs.
JONES, C. J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Higgins, Gorbey, George & DiOrio, William A. George, Media, for appellants.
Paul C. Van Dyke, Media, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
353 A.2d 33
Rose BRUGNETTI v. Harry T. DARNALL and Helen T. Darnall, his wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 16, 1976.
Decided March 17, 1976.
Higgins, Gorbey, George & DiOrio, William A. George, Media, for appellants.
Paul C. Van Dyke, Media, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
